attributes.action: Child Welfare Report statements to be signed as a true account.
attributes.additional_details:
Statements given to police are signed as true. Child welfare report statements should also be signed. Both are used in court.

Our children deserve a fair hearing.
attributes.background: Reform. Statements signed as true by the person who gave the statement. Record interviews. Retain recordings as a minimum until the report is signed as accurate so it can be used to confirm discrepancies if any.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Scottish Government and Scottish Parliament is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it. 

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.parliament.scot/
